Error.description:
We've unfortunately encountered an error.

You can try to reload the page you were visiting.
Error.title: Something went wrong!

IndexPage.description: Demo showing how next-intl static rendering setup with generateStaticParams() and setRequestLocale() enables Next.js 16 cacheComponents. Page extracts locale from params and passes it explicitly to cached components.
IndexPage.title: cacheComponents Demo with next-intl

dynamicComponent.title: Dynamic Component
dynamicComponent.content: Uses getTranslations() without locale parameter, relying on setRequestLocale() context from static rendering setup with generateStaticParams(). Not cached - executes on each request.

cachedComponent.title: Cached Component
cachedComponent.content: Receives locale from params (generated by generateStaticParams()) as prop and uses getTranslations with explicit locale. Works with 'use cache' because locale is passed explicitly, not read from headers().

NotFoundPage.description: Please double-check the browser address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.
NotFoundPage.title: Page not found

docs.description: Learn more about next-intl in the official docs.
docs.title: Docs

source.description: Browse the cacheComponents implementation on GitHub.
source.title: Implementation

PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).
PathnamesPage.title: Pathnames
